name: FruitDefenderVR
description:
Gif of gameplay @ Imgur

Fruit Defender VR is a game for the HTC Vive. The goal is to keep an apple alive while ninjas are throwing ninja stars towards your precious apple.

The player gets a score based on how long they can keep the apple alive without holding it, forcing the player to juggle the apple in the air for a better score.

The game is made using Unity.

Made by
Kevin Lövgren "Dev-Kev"

Music by
OurMusicBox

3D Environment Assets
@Quaternius
